nodes.text: Gambo was a male Houk criminal who lived on Coruscant and could only be reached through his Rodian guard Zooki. Police Officer Anstiss of the Coruscant Security Force was assigned the task of arresting Gambo. Though he beat her up several times, she was able to complete her task with the help of a Republic individual.
Gambo appears in the Cantina Contusions mission for a Republic character in Star Wars: The Old Republic. The character can choose to convince Gambo to turn himself in, arrest him, or kill him.
